name: Primitive Survival
description:
Conquer the stone age! Primitive Survival is a skill-based survival RPG. You begin as a primitive human and progress through the first steps toward civilization. Become a hunter/gatherer in a primitive world. The skills you learn are based on what you spend your time doing. Avoid dangerous predators as you learn the skills needed to overcome all obstacles. Complete quests to further your knowledge of the world.

Hunt dangerous animals.

Survive as a gatherer and a hunter.

Craft primitive tools.

This game is in early access with more features on the way.

Planned content includes:
More quests...including the quest for fire.
Tribal management.
Trading with/Warring with other tribes.
Group hunts.
More skills and crafting options.
Multiplayer support.
